title: Why every man needs to get his social media in order
description:
Watch The Full Thing Here : 
————————————————————
Ready to build a network of amazing women and high-status men?

Michael’s Men of Action is a one-on-one Master’s program that teaches men how to create elite 
social lives by becoming higher status.

Click this link to learn how you can have a High-Status lifestyle now:
https://m.moamentoring.com/podcast

Click here to join the Men of Action community and watch the High-Status Networking 101 course:
https://m.moamentoring.com/moa-community

Interested in joining the Men of Action sales team? Apply here:
https://www.moamentoring.com/jobs/sales

Men of Action has an affiliate program! Post pre-made content and get paid passively:
https://www.moamentoring.com/affiliate
————————————————————

Subscribe on Youtube: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/MichaelSartain

Listen on Apple Podcast: 
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-michael-sartain-podcast/id1579791157

Listen on Spotify: 
https://open.spotify.com/show/2faAYwvDD9Bvkpwv6umlPO?si=8Q3ak9HnSlKjuChsTXr6YQ&dl_branch=1

#michael #michaelsartain #michael_sartain #michael_sartain_podcast

channel_info.title: Michael Sartain
channel_info.description:
🎙Host of The Michael Sartain Podcast 

🔥Teaching you how to build a network of desirable women and high-status men

👇 Click the "Men of Action" link below now to forge a high-status lifestyle and join the elites

transcription: {"text": "I'm 46 years old and people my age, they're like very anti-social media. They don't like when people pull out their phones at dinner. And I don't like that either, but it's one of these situations where like, if you're a man, you kind of have to understand you need to lean into that. You need better photos. You need to show competency, relevancy, access to scarce resources. You need to show high status on social media. And when you do so, even if you're in real life game is a 10, but your social media is an eight, your social media is still scalable. 100,000 X to your in real life. So you can still get more women that way. A lot of guys do not want to adapt, bro. They want to do what has always worked, what they know best. They're super comfortable, super complacent. I think that's the perfect point. She's made. You have to lean into this. This is a new game. The girl at your job that you think is a nine doesn't just have access to you. She has access to every celebrity in your city. Every celebrity that comes to visit your city, because that's what these dudes are doing. They're DMing her when they come to the city. So you're now competing with the top echelon.
